Package sharedRegions

Class Repository

java.lang.Object
sharedRegions.Repository
All Implemented Interfaces:
SharedRegion
public class Repository
extends Object
implements SharedRegion
This datatype implements the general repository of information shared region. The internal state of the simulation is kept here and the logging is handled.
